Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Vampir nobles in the Citadel of Torment are spreading their corruption throughout the surrounding areas.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:33#3#vampir noblewomen}, {@LinkCreature:33#53#cursed vampir noblewomen}, {@LinkCreature:33#4#vampir gentlemen}, {@LinkCreature:33#54#cursed vampir gentlemen}, {@LinkCreature:33#5#cursed jesters}, {@LinkCreature:33#55#infernal jesters}, {@LinkCreature:33#6#malevolent wraiths}, and {@LinkCreature:33#7#eldritch defenders}.

Report to Celion when mission is complete.
It's a reward from the federation. Blessings to all the members of the guild!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
